info.title: Stride API
info.description: This service provides public API for the Stride.

scopes.manage:conversation: Required to create, update, archive or unarchive conversations
scopes.participate:conversation: Enables your app to perform most operations via the API

get.description:
The API returns the list of conversations the app has access to

Authentication required, with scope participate:conversation

parameters.name: include-private
parameters.description: Include private conversations into response. Default to 'true'.

parameters.name: include-archived
parameters.description: Include archived conversations into response. Default to 'false'.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: A maximum number of conversations to return per call. Valid length range: 1 - 75. Default value is 75.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A string containing full or part of conversation's name. May be empty.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: The cursor is a string, that you can use to scroll through the data set to get more results.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: A sort order of the conversations lists. Supported values: asc or desc.

parameters.name: exclude-direct
parameters.description: Exclude direct messages from a response. Default to 'false'

201.description: CreateConversationResponse returns a successful response for the create conversation api.

get.description: Get a direct conversation of a user.
get.summary: Get a direct conversation of a user

externalDocs.description: Guide: Sending direct messages to users

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
The method by default accepts the JSON with the Atlassian document structure (https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/stride/apis/document/structure/).
If you want to send a plain text then you can set header "Content-type" = "text/plain" and put a plain text string into the request body.

201.description: MessageSendResponse is a message send response.

put.summary: Edit a message in a direct conversation

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
The method by default accepts the JSON with the Atlassian document structure (https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/stride/apis/document/structure/).
If you want to send a plain text then you can set header "Content-type" = "text/plain" and put a plain text string into the request body.

200.description: MessageEditResponse is a message edit response.

delete.summary: Delete a message in a direct conversation

get.description:
Authentication required, with scope participate:conversation

This method returns messages after/before a given messageIDs or/and timestamps.
If these parameters are omitted the method returns conversationâ€™s latest messages.
Max number of messages returned is 75.

parameters.name: beforeMessage
parameters.description: Returns at most 75 messages before a provided messageID

parameters.name: beforeTimestamp
parameters.description: Returns at most 75 messages before a provided RFC3339 timestamp (2006-01-02T15:04:05+07:00)

parameters.name: afterMessage
parameters.description: Returns at most 75 latest messages after a provided messageID

parameters.name: afterTimestamp
parameters.description: Returns at most 75 latest messages after a provided RFC3339 timestamp (2006-01-02T15:04:05+07:00)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results. Default value is 75

200.description: MessageListResponse is a response that contains a list of messages.

post.description: Send a message to a conversation.
post.summary: Send a message to a conversation

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
The method by default accepts the JSON with the Atlassian document structure (https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/stride/apis/document/structure/).
If you want to send a plain text then you can set header "Content-type" = "text/plain" and put a plain text string into the request body.

201.description: MessageSendResponse is a message send response.

get.description:
Authentication required, with scope participate:conversation

Max number of messages returned is 75.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results. Default value is 75.

200.description: MessageListResponse is a response that contains a list of messages.

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: The ID of the Message to retrieve.

200.description: MessageResponse is a successful response with a single message.

put.summary: Edit a message in a conversation

parameters.name: body
parameters.description:
The method by default accepts the JSON with the Atlassian document structure (https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/stride/apis/document/structure/).
If you want to send a plain text then you can set header "Content-type" = "text/plain" and put a plain text string into the request body.

200.description: MessageEditResponse is a message edit response.

delete.summary: Delete a message in a conversation

get.description:
Authentication required, with scope participate:conversation

This method returns messages after and/or before a given messageID including the message itself.
Default value for 'after' and 'before' query parameters is 0.
Max number of messages returned is 75.

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: The ID of the Message to retrieve.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: A number of messages to return before the Message.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: A number of messages to return after the Message.

200.description: MessageListResponse is a response that contains a list of messages.
